titleStmt.title: A proclamation anent the murtherers of the late Archbishop of St. Andrews, and appointing magistrates and councils of burghs royal to sign the declaration at Michaelmas next
Proclamations. 1679-09-20
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Privy Council.
Charles II, King of England, 1630-1685.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by the heir Andrew Anderson,

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: Edinburgh the twentieth day of September, 1679. And of Our Rign [sic] the thirty one year.
DFo copy on reel 2370 is cropped at foot affecting the imprint.
Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library, Washington, D.C..
